name: Evil Mind
text: If you control a Fiend monster: Activate 1 of these effects, based on the number of monsters in your opponent's GY;/n● 1+: Draw 1 card./n● 4+: Add 1 "HERO" monster or 1 "Dark Fusion" from your Deck to your hand./n● 10+: Add 1 "Polymerization" Spell or 1 "Fusion" Spell from your Deck to your hand./nYou can only activate 1 "Evil Mind" per turn.
